---
abstract: > 
  Russian television suggests Russia must defend against strong NATO but can easily nuke NATO capitals. What?
---

# Nuklear propaganda strikes  {#sec-nukes-propaganda}

::: {.callout-caution title="Myth"}
- NATO threatened Russia with nukes
- Russia can easily nuke NATO
[<br></br>![Search for topic in EUvsDisinfo](../all_common_img/EUvsDisinfo_400x240.jpg){height=2em}](https://euvsdisinfo.eu/disinformation-cases/?text=(nato%7Cus)%20(nukes%7Cnuclear)%20russia&sort=relevance)
:::

::: {.callout-tip title="Truth"}
Russian TV is threatening NATO to nuke their capitals, but that's propaganda nonsense: nobody nukes anyone else without further ado
:::
